products.name: V60
products.description: Our V60 pour-over offers a meticulously crafted coffee experience. Brewed to highlight the beans' unique flavor profiles.

products.name: Chemex
products.description: Our Chemex brew showcases the art of slow coffee making. This method highlights smooth, clean flavors with a delicate balance.

products.name: Syphon
products.description: Syphon coffee is a captivating brewing method that combines science and art to deliver a rich, full-bodied cup. Known for its smooth texture and vibrant flavors.

products.name: Aeropress
products.description: Aeropress coffee offers a quick and versatile brewing method, delivering a smooth, rich, and flavorful cup with low acidity.

products.name: Americano
products.description: An Americano is a simple yet flavorful coffee made by diluting a shot or two of espresso with hot water.

products.name: Spanish Hot
products.description: The Spanish Latte Hot Shot is a delightful fusion of bold espresso, creamy steamed milk, and a touch of sweetness.

products.name: Latte
products.description: A Latte is a smooth coffee drink made with a shot of espresso and steamed milk, topped with a light layer of microfoam.

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: A Cappuccino is a classic coffee drink made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.

products.name: Flat White
products.description: The Flat White is a smooth and velvety coffee drink, combining a rich espresso base with finely textured steamed milk.

products.name: Mocha
products.description: White Mocha is a sweet and creamy coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and white chocolate syrup.

products.name: Hot Chocolate
products.description: Hot Chocolate is a comforting classic made with rich, velvety chocolate blended into perfectly steamed milk.

products.name: Coconut Latte
products.description: The Coconut Latte is a tropical twist on a coffee classic, blending smooth espresso with creamy coconut milk.

products.name: Long Black
products.description: The Long Black is a simple yet bold coffee, made by pouring a double shot of espresso over hot water.

products.name: White Mocha
products.description: White Mocha is a creamy and indulgent coffee drink, combining rich espresso with velvety steamed milk and a touch of sweet white chocolate syrup.

products.name: Pistachio Hot
products.description: The Pistachio Hot is a luxurious coffee drink that blends rich espresso with creamy milk and a hint of nutty pistachio flavor.

products.name: Spanish The Fall Edition
products.description: Perfectly balanced, it delivers a warm and indulgent coffee experience that captures the essence of autumn.

products.name: Twist Caramel
products.description: Twisted Caramel is a decadent coffee treat featuring bold espresso blended with creamy steamed milk and a swirl of rich caramel syrup & Topped with whipped cream.

products.name: Espresso
products.description: Espresso is a bold and concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely ground coffee under pressure.

products.name: Double Espresso
products.description: A Double Espresso, also known as a Doppio, is a robust and intense coffee made with two shots of espresso.

products.name: Picolo
products.description: A Piccolo is a small yet flavorful coffee made with a single shot of espresso and topped with steamed milk.

products.name: Cortado
products.description: A Cortado is a balanced coffee drink made with equal parts espresso and steamed milk.

products.name: Mini Signature
products.description: A perfectly balanced, rich taste in a petite serving, ideal for a quick, satisfying flavorful moment.

products.name: Little Paris
products.description: This drink captures the elegance and romance of Paris in every sip.

products.name: Korean Maccito
products.description: This drink combines rich coffee flavors with a smooth, velvety texture, offering a unique and indulgent coffee experience.

products.name: Japanese Macchiato
products.description: The Japanese Macchiato is a unique take on the traditional macchiato, typically featuring a rich espresso topped with a smooth layer of frothed milk and a drizzle of sweetened condensed milk.

products.name: Shaghf Frappe
products.description: A frappe with smooth, frosty coffee experience with a perfect balance of sweetness and boldness.

products.name: Single Espresso
products.description: Rich and bold single shot of espresso, the perfect pick-me-up for true coffee lovers.

products.name: Pistachio Frappe
products.description: Our Pistachio Frappe offers a smooth, nutty flavor that’s both cool and indulgent, perfect for a refreshing treat.

products.name: Creamy Cookies
products.description: Blended to a smooth, creamy texture, it offers a sweet, dessert-like experience, perfect for cookie lovers craving a cool treat.

products.name: Lotus Frappe
products.description: Our Lotus Frappe offers a sweet, spiced flavor with a satisfying crunch, making it a perfect treat for biscuit and coffee lovers alike.

products.name: Crunchy Frappe
products.description: Our Crunchy Frappe offers a satisfying balance of creamy sweetness and delightful crunch in every sip.

products.name: Mango Frappe
products.description: Smooth and creamy, it offers a tropical, sweet flavor that's both cool and indulgent, perfect for a refreshing treat on a warm day.

products.name: Locker Frappe
products.description: Our Locker Frappe feature sweet and creamy notes. It's a smooth, indulgent treat that’s perfect for those looking for a satisfying, frosty beverage.

products.name: Blueberry Frappe
products.description: A fruity treat offers a sweet, tangy flavor with a smooth and creamy texture, perfect for a cooling, indulgent beverage on a warm day.

products.description: Blended to a creamy texture, it offers a sweet, chocolatey taste with hints of indulgent brownie, making it a perfect treat for dessert lovers.

products.name: Picconova Ice
products.description: Picconova Ice is a smooth, frosty treat, offering a cool and indulgent experience with a rich and flavorful twist.

products.name: Cinnamon Frappe

products.description: A Taste of Tradition in Every Sip! Experience the goodness of Sukkari Dates Frappe.

products.name: Coconut Latte
products.description: Our Coconut Latte offers a smooth, nutty flavor with a hint of coconut, creating a cool, indulgent coffee experience.

products.description: Our Movie Latte is a fun and indulgent coffee drink often associated with comfort and relaxation.
